message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's worth considering at a price of $900,000.
While I appreciate your offer, $900,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I understand that $850,000 is a bit lower than what I was initially looking for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer the product to you for $875,000. This is my final offer within this range.
